text: Usi ki taraf tum sabko palat kar jana hai. Yeh Allah ka pakka wada hai. Beshak paidaish ki ibteda wahi karta hai, phir wahi dobara paida karega, taa-ke jo log iman laye aur jinhon ne neik aamaal kiye unko poorey insaf ke saath jaza de, aur jinhon ne kufr ka tareeqa ikhtiyar kiya woh khaulta(boiling) hua pani piyein aur dardnaak saza bhugtein us inkar e haqq ke padash mein jo woh karte rahey
